# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill has no fuel
- Stone furnace has no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
- Stone furnace has no ingredients

### Inserter system at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter is waiting for source items

### Inserter system at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
- Burner inserter has no fuel

### Offshore pump system at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Offshore pump is working

### Boiler system at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Boiler has no fuel

### Steam engine system at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Steam engine is not connected

### Pipe group system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group is empty

### Pipe group system at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group has full output

### Electricity group system at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
- Electricity group is not plugged into the electric network

### Belt group system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Belt group is empty

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is working

### Transport belt system at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that entities have fuel before attempting to use them
- Check the entity's status to see if it has no fuel

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that entities have ingredients before attempting to use them
- Check the entity's status to see if it has no ingredients

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities are connected before attempting to use them
- Check the entity's status to see if it is not connected

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them
- Check the entity's status to see if it is not plugged into the electric network

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that entities have source items before attempting to use them
- Check the entity's status to see if it is waiting for source items

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
No important variables have been assigned.
